price: Ne, naprotiv! Zaista, oni će taj dan od viđenja svoga Gospodara zastrti biti,
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
